
Forgot your password, ${c.firstname}?

Baruwa received a request to reset the password for your Baruwa
Account: (${c.username}).

If you want to reset your password, click on the link below
(or copy and paste the URL into your browser):
${c.reset_url}

This link takes you to a secure page where you can change your password.

If you don't want to reset your password, please ignore this message.
Your password will not be reset.

Regards,

Baruwa Bot
www.baruwa.net
